index.speaker: ben-felda
index.name: Graphic Effects with Native SVG Filters
index.description: Add filters, blur, emboss, the gooey effect, and many other fun effects to html elements without plugins.  This course will provide a brief introduction to what is possible with svg filters, and a deeper dive into some of the more complex base components and how they tick.  After this course, you will think twice before jumping to an image editor.
index.title: Graphic Effects with Native SVG Filters | Sessions | MKE DOT NET
index.metaDescription: Graphic Effects with Native SVG Filters
